title: Looking to start a casual ranked team!
body:
As the title would suggest I'm looking to start up a casual but committed ranked team. 

You must have Skype or Teamspeak!

Rank does not matter, but please take criticism seriously and be willing to learn. Add me if you would like to apply/join.

 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: Add me~ i started playing league this year~ im improving fast tho~ maybe cuz i play nearly everyday

I'm just looking forward to learn the game more.

Hit me up if you accept me.
